title: WRTN uses Claude to power AI interactions for millions across Asia \ Anthropic

metadata.title: WRTN uses Claude to power AI interactions for millions across Asia \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Discover how WRTN, a leading consumer AI aggregator in South Korea and Japan, leverages Anthropic's Claude to serve 4.5 million monthly active users. Learn how WRTN bridges the AI adoption gap, transforms digital entertainment, and enhances productivity across Asia with natural language AI interactions.
